title: Base Validation
description: Schema for submitting a validation (antibody or biosample) to ENCODE
comment: Validation images and captions accompany antibody lots submitted for review and biosamples containing constructs

validation_method.description: Experimental method for the validation image
validation_method.comment: Choose from one of the enumerated validation methods. [This list will likely get mapped to an experimental methods ontology in the future.]
validation_method.title: Antibody or biosample characterization method
enum: Western blot, Western blot after IP

caption.description: A free-text caption for the validation image
caption.comment: Captions for antibody characterizations should include brief methods, expected MW, cell line(s), labels and justification for acceptance, if necessary
caption.title: Image caption

date_validated.description: Date in which the validation experiment was run
date_validated.comment: Dates should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD
date_validated.title: Date validated

references.comment: If validation data is from a publication, provide the relevant Pubmed identifier(s) in PMID:NNNNNNNN format
references.title: References

reference.description: Pubmed id for a published reference
reference.title: Pubmed reference

status.description: Approval status for the Validation image
status.comment: Use the default, all other values are assigned by the DCC. The status code indicates the current state of the characterization image
status.title: Approval status

validation_comment.description: Comment(s), if any, to associate to the validation or the status of the validation
validation_comment.comment: A free-text field for comments relating to the validation or its status
validation_comment.title: Validation comment
